scripts.dev: start /b npm run dev:backend && npm run dev:frontend
scripts.start: start /b npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:frontend: cd front-end && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.docker:mongo: docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name mongocard -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=cardDb -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=cardps mongo
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd back-end && npm install && cd ../front-end && npm install
